com.example.sip
Class School

java.lang.Object
  com.example.sip.School

public class School
extends java.lang.Object

School is an object containing information for a specific school in London..There exists 714 schools in the database hence during execution there will be 714 instances of the school object.

Author:
Loucas Stylianou

Field Summary
private  int boroughId
          Borough's Id where the school exists.
private  float gcseResults
          School's average points achieved by its students in GCSE exams
private  float Latitude
          School's coordinate latitude
private  float Longitude
          School's coordinate longitude
private  java.lang.String name
          School's name
private  int numOfEligibleStudents
          Number of eligible students of the current school that were registered to take the gcse exams
private  int schoolId
          Schools' id which is used for ease of access of the instances of the school object
private  boolean selected
          Variable to check whether the current school is selected or not by the user in the SchoolListActivity

Parameters:
id - School id is used for easy reference to each school
bid - Borough id is used to connect school and borough relation
Name - School name
results - Average school results on GCSE exams
Lat - School coordinate: Latitude
Long - School coordinate: Longitude
numStudents - Number of eligible students
